content: a free version of this pattern can be found in my website here 1 this listing if for a printable pdf file which will be available for immediate download after purchase the pdf file consists of a total of 8 pages including cover images copyright and information about the designer there is step by step pictures and detailed instructions to make the crochet hat pictured here this is a crochet cat ear beanie pattern it was written using standard us terminology sizes available / approximate size of the finished hats 1 teen/small adult fits heads size 21 -22 53-56 cm 2 adult large fits head size 23 -24 58-61 cm yarn bulky #5 i used 20% wool / 80% acrylic hue and me by lion brand amount was 4 34 oz 123 g or 135 yds 123 m for the adult large size color 1 was arrowwood approx 2 34 oz 66 g color 2 was harbor approx 2 oz 57 g amount was 3 62 oz 103 g or 106 yds 97 m for the small adult / teen size color 1 was agave i used approx 1 96 oz 56 g color 2 was haze i used approx 1 66 oz 47 g materials and tools 6 mm us j hook scissors yarn needle measuring tape or rule gauge crochet a swatch to have these measurements 9 double_crochet x 5 row = 4 without blocking language english us level of difficulty easy the skills you will need to know are chains double_crochet front post single_crochet fpsc written instructions included color change written instructions included fasten_off and weave in ends i do not offer video tutorials for my patterns terms of use | copyright all pictures and the pattern contained in this document are the property of zamiguz handmade creations by magna haskell aka maggie this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to copy share resell translate publish alter distribute or reproduce the pattern or parts of it in any form online or offline you may sell your handmade items made from my patterns and i would appreciate if you gave credits to zamiguz handmade creations @zamiguz no mass production allowed after you purchase and your payment is confirmed you will be receiving an email from etsy with the link to download your file here is a link with more information on how it works https //help etsy com/hc/en-us/articles/115013328108-downloading-a-digital-item segment=shopping 1 https //zamiguz com/crochet-cat-ears-hat-pattern/
